A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I'm gonna sound like an hypocrite here but if you pay attention\, most 5 star comments look like they are from people who put more energy into attacking the critics rather than defending the movie. 
The movie is bad\, even if you ignore the amount of political propaganda it contains. You can definine every character with just a few words because they dont have any deep development and everything is just superficial and poorly written.
Snoke is just the bad guy\, that's it\, he looks intimidating thanks to impressive CGI  but he's just a Disney villain\, he failed at seducing Rey to the dark side because of her Mary Sue powers and determination\, and failed to see Kylo's betrayal. 
Rey is still as overpowered and uniteresting as always
Kylo is probably the coolest character in this movie just because the scene where he kills snoke is awesome
